data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 3
data.actual_result: There is no background color. For light theme the text is even not viewable.
data.expected_result: The code block in the message preview for these modals should show the background color for code blocks.
data.short_description: Code block has no background color for pin/delete message modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and write a message with a code block (1 or 3 backticks) - Long hold the message and select either "Delete Message" or "Pin message" - Observe the message preview there
